hero.title: Ajuda Digital
hero.subtitle: Homegrown Government Chatbot by Timorese Youth
hero.description: Empowering citizens with instant access to government services through AI. Ask questions in your native language and get complete information about documents, procedures, and requirements.

challenges.title: The Challenge We're Solving
challenges.description: Citizens struggle with complex government services across multiple departments—from business registration to understanding constitutional rights, obtaining birth certificates, and establishing companies.

scatteredInfo.title: Scattered Information
scatteredInfo.description: Information exists mainly in Portuguese on complicated government websites

officeVisits.title: Office Visits Required
officeVisits.description: Citizens must visit offices to read information boards or ask family for help

documentRejections.title: Document Rejections
documentRejections.description: Wrong information leads to rejections when citizens arrive without proper documents

features.title: How Ajuda Digital Helps
features.description: Our AI-powered platform provides instant, accurate information about government services in the languages Timorese citizens speak.

specializedAssistants.title: 10 Specialized AI Assistants
specializedAssistants.description: Department-specific chatbots for Civil Registry, Immigration, Education, Business, and more.

multilingualSupport.title: Multilingual Support
multilingualSupport.description: Communicate in English, Portuguese, Tetum, and other languages.

instantResponses.title: Instant Responses
instantResponses.description: Get immediate answers about required documents and procedures, eliminating office visits.

comprehensiveDatabase.title: Comprehensive Database
comprehensiveDatabase.description: Access to complete government procedures, laws, and documentation requirements.

technology.title: Powered by Advanced Technology
technology.description: Built with cutting-edge AI models and enterprise-grade infrastructure to serve Timor-Leste's digital government needs.

cta.title: Ready to Experience the Future of Government Services?
cta.description: Join Us to use Ajuda Digital to access government information instantly and accurately.

footer.description: Empowering Timorese citizens with AI-powered government service assistance. Built by young developers for their country.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Ajuda Digital. Built with ❤️ in Timor-Leste.
